channel.title: godaddy on David Collantes
channel.description: Recent content in godaddy on David Collantes

item.title: Stop spamming, GoDaddy!
item.description: I have several domains registered at Godaddy. For the ones I care about, I have auto renew enabled. For those I am letting go, I don’t. Godaddy gentlemanly reminds me when those about to expire domains are about to do so… four months in advance! The email “reminders” do not cease from there on. And then regular mail (snail mail, that is) starts coming to my mailbox as well. Don’t you get it, Godaddy?
